prompt: Which of the following searches would likely give you the best results if you were searching for a Chicago-area job placement agency called Creative Jobs Agency?
feedback: The best choice is to search for Creative Jobs Agency in quotes, along with the word Chicago outside of the quotes. Without the quotes, you’ll likely find a lot of web pages that use all the words “creative,” “jobs,” and “agency,” but aren’t about the specific business you’re looking for. Including the word “Chicago” will narrow down your results, but it should be outside the quote marks, since the city name likely appears separately from the business name on the website.
